description:
Download the new FREE Sportlobster app and join Serge Ibaka, Cristiano Ronaldo and a host of other sporting legends. Get involved in the conversation with athletes and fans on a wide range of sports including the NFL, MLB, NBA, NHL, International Soccer games including the EPL and many more. 

• Follow your favorite athletes to get their latest updates 
• Make predictions on upcoming fixtures to earn bragging rights and win prizes 
• Post ‘lobs’, tag your friends on Sportlobster and share your views with other fans 
• Read and write blogs on topics that real fans are passionate about 
• Join Fanzones for the latest and breaking news across a huge range of sports from Football to UFC 
• See upcoming fixtures, live scores and standings for all the major sporting events 

Cristiano Ronaldo says: “I’m so proud to be an ambassador for Sportlobster. We can change the way fans consume sport forever. It has already reached one million users in just over one year” 

Sportlobster provides everything a sports fan needs, all in one place. Who are you rooting for? 

Read some reviews from our fans: 

• “This app is amazing! I love being able to interact with sports enthusiasts from all over the world!” 

• “This is a great app. Good layout, easy access, super easy to get notifications, news, fixtures!” 

Here at Sportlobster, we’d love to hear your feedback. If you have any questions or queries, email us at support@sportlobster.com
trackCensoredName: Sportlobster – The Sports Social Network for Fans of American Football, Basketball, Ice Hockey and more
trackName: Sportlobster – The Sports Social Network for Fans of American Football, Basketball, Ice Hockey and more
releaseNotes:
Access to the Sportlobster app is now freely available without setting up a profile.

We've added a new following filter so you can quickly see all the content from your friends and favourite athletes in one place, just follow people and their content will appear in the Following tab.

New look navigation! It's now super easy to lob, check upcoming fixtures, make predictions and access your notifications.

We've simplified the 'events' section meaning checking the upcoming fixtures and predicting on them couldn't be easier. We've even brought in a swipe mechanism so you can make your ten predictions in no time.

Silence the crowd and mute those users that add content you don’t want to see! 

We’ve also made fixes to iOS 8 compatibility and squashed bugs to improve the user experience.
